Cleaning Hacks

  • Home
  •  Blog
  •  Cleaning Hacks
24 July, 2019

Modern Rules Of Hygienic Cleaning

  • By Chathura Sanka

Introduction

A clean and organized workspace can boost productivity, reduce stress, and create a professional environment. But who has the time for deep cleaning every day? The good news is, with a few simple hacks, you can keep your office spotless without breaking a sweat. Here are ten office cleaning hacks that will transform your workspace overnight!

1. Declutter First, Clean Later

Before diving into deep cleaning, start by decluttering your desk and workspace. Remove unnecessary items, organize your papers, and toss out expired documents. A clear desk leads to a clear mind!

Quick Hack: Use a “three-box method”: Keep, Recycle, Trash. Invest in desk organizers to keep things tidy.

2. Use Microfiber Cloths for Dusting

Regular dusting is essential to maintain a clean office. Instead of paper towels, opt for microfiber cloths. They trap dust more effectively and don’t leave streaks.

Quick Hack: Lightly dampen the microfiber cloth to capture more dust. Keep one in your desk drawer for quick touch-ups.

3. Disinfect Your Keyboard and Mouse

Your keyboard and mouse harbor more bacteria than a toilet seat! Wipe them down regularly to keep germs at bay.

Quick Hack: Use a cotton swab dipped in isopropyl alcohol to clean between the keys. Disinfectant wipes work great for quick cleaning.

4. Freshen Up Office Air Naturally

Poor air quality can lead to headaches and fatigue. Improve it with natural solutions.

Quick Hack: Place small indoor plants like snake plants or peace lilies. Use a bowl of baking soda to absorb odors.

5. Use Coffee Filters for Screen Cleaning

Paper towels leave lint and streaks on your screen. Instead, use coffee filters!

Quick Hack: Gently wipe your monitor with a dry coffee filter. For stubborn smudges, use a mix of distilled water and white vinegar.

6. Keep Your Office Chair Clean

Over time, office chairs collect dust, stains, and even food crumbs.

Quick Hack: Use a lint roller to remove dust and hair. A mixture of water and mild soap works for fabric chairs.

7. Organize Cables with Binder Clips

Messy cables can make your office look untidy and be a tripping hazard.

Quick Hack: Attach binder clips to the edge of your desk and thread cables through them. Use Velcro ties to bundle excess cables together.

8. Use Lemon for a Fresh-Smelling Office

Lemons are great natural cleaners and deodorizers.

Quick Hack: Mix lemon juice with water for a natural surface cleaner. Keep lemon peels in a small dish to absorb odors.

9. Clean Office Windows with Vinegar

Sparkling clean windows let in more natural light and create a welcoming atmosphere.

Quick Hack: Mix equal parts vinegar and water in a spray bottle. Use a microfiber cloth or newspaper for a streak-free shine.

10. Keep a Desk Cleaning Kit

Having a small cleaning kit at your desk ensures you can clean up messes quickly.

Quick Hack: Include disinfectant wipes, microfiber cloths, a mini brush, and hand sanitizer. Keep everything in a small container for easy access.

How Wilshine Cleaning Services Can Help

While these hacks help maintain a clean office, sometimes you need a professional touch. Wilshine Cleaning Services offers expert office cleaning solutions tailored to your needs.

Conclusion

A clean office is a productive office! With these ten simple cleaning hacks, you can maintain a fresh, organized workspace overnight. But for deeper cleaning and long-term maintenance, professional services like Wilshine Property Services can make all the difference. Ready to transform your workspace? Start implementing these hacks today!

FAQs

  1. How often should I clean my office desk? It’s best to clean your office desk at least once a week and disinfect high-touch areas daily.
  2. What is the best way to clean a computer screen? Use a microfiber cloth and a solution of distilled water with white vinegar for a streak-free screen.
  3. How do I keep my office smelling fresh all day? Use natural air fresheners like lemon peels, essential oil diffusers, or a small bowl of baking soda.
  4. Can I use regular household cleaners for my office? Yes, but avoid harsh chemicals. Opt for eco-friendly, non-toxic cleaners for a healthier workspace.
  5. Why should I hire a professional cleaning service? Professional office cleaning services ensure deep cleaning, better hygiene, and a consistently fresh workspace without the hassle.
